messages.content: You are an automated program repair tool. Please answer with the correct line in a code block.

The following Java code contains a buggy line that has been replaced with INFILL:
```java
public class JsonWriter implements Closeable, Flushable {
   */
  public JsonWriter value(double value) throws IOException {
    writeDeferredName();
INFILL
      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Numeric values must be finite, but was " + value);
    }
    beforeValue();
```

This was the original buggy line which was at the INFILL location:
```java
    if (Double.isNaN(value) || Double.isInfinite(value)) {
```

The code fails on this test:
```java
testNonFiniteDoublesWhenLenient
```

on this test line:
```java

```

with this error message:


Please provide the correct line at the INFILL location.
